alert.note: Alert for Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Manatee and central Sarasota Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 158 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Gulf Gate Estates, or 14 miles south of Sarasota, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Myakka River State Park, Osprey, Nokomis, Vamo, Laurel, Turtle Beach, Oscar Scherer State Park, Venice Gardens, Warm Mineral Springs and South Venice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Sarasota; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
